text: Baile Glas or Ballaglasa () is a settlement on Grimsay in the Outer Hebrides, Scotland. Ballaglasa is within the parish of North Uist. ==References== ==External links== *Canmore - North Uist, Grimsay, School and Schoolhouse site record *Canmore - Grimsay, Loch An Fhaing site record *Canmore - Baile Glas, Grimsay site record Category:Villages in the Outer Hebrides
title: Baile Glas
